import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useLogout } from '../hooks/useLogout' const Navbar = () => { const {logout}= useLogout() const data = useSelector((state)=>state.user) const handleClick =()=>{ logout() } return (

Workout Buddy

{data?<>

{data.email}

:<> } Login Signup
) } export default Navbar
